org.macroing.gdt.openrc.geometry

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.macroing.gdt.openrc.geometry.Camera

  • public final class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    The values in the float array array consists of the following:
    1. Eye X
    2. Eye Y
    3. Eye Z
    4. Up X
    5. Up Y
    6. Up Z
    7. Look-at X
    8. Look-at Y
    9. Look-at Z
    10. OrthoNormalBasis-U X
    11. OrthoNormalBasis-U Y
    12. OrthoNormalBasis-U Z
    13. OrthoNormalBasis-V X
    14. OrthoNormalBasis-V Y
    15. OrthoNormalBasis-V Z
    16. OrthoNormalBasis-W X
    17. OrthoNormalBasis-W Y
    18. OrthoNormalBasis-W Z
    19. View-plane distance
    20. Zoom
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jörgen Lundgren
